creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
description: black and white lithograph with illustrated image of figures on horseback; two central figures are an older male figure on the left and a younger female figure on the right; another male figure in a top hat and on horseback in background on center left; faint standing figure on center right; wooded trees in URQ; text in French across top margin reading, "MAYEUX ET ROBERT MACAIRE", as well as a block of French text on the bottom
inscription: LRQ, in black ink: Chez Bauger R du Croissant 16
provenance: [Flea market, Paris, early 1990s, to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Gabe and Yvonne Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
signed: LRC, etched in black ink: C.J.T
title: Mayeux et Robert Macaire - Sous les auspices de ses deux associes...
